Variables
SharpNeat.​Tasks.​Xor
namespace SharpNeat.Tasks.Xor
XorEvaluator
IPhenomeEvaluator​<IBlackBox<double>>
public sealed
XorEvaluator

Evaluator for the logical XOR task.  Two inputs supply the two XOR input values.  The correct response for the single output is input1 XOR input2.  Evaluation consists of querying the provided black box for all possible input combinations (2^2 = 4).

Functions
Evaluate
public FitnessInfo Evaluate(
IBlackBox<double> box
)

Evaluate the provided black box against the logical XOR task, and return its fitness score.

Parameter
box
IBlackBox<double>

The black box to evaluate.

A new instance of FitnessInfo.
